title: Blind Lemon's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A blues music bar and eatery situated at the first bend of the main side road to Barrio 3, up the street from Moonfish. Veggie choices include tofu burger, burrito, pizza, pasta, and other comfort food. The "sopa verde" is a group choice for vegetarians. Owners understand vegetarian food and some items can be made vegan on request. Weekly music and movie nights, billiards table.
